belgium_office_address: Rue Philippe Le Bon 15 Arriere Batiment
goals__remit: Business Solutions Europa is an indipendent European communications agency whose mission is to bring Europe closer to Europeans. We help organizations and individuals understand the politics and policies of the European Union and contribute to their development and we facilitate dialogue and the exchange of important and practical information with the institutions and key European bodies. We also help institutions communicate to everyday Europeans the purposes and policies of the EU, as well as its effect on their daily lives
